snippet.title: Clockwork - PC Gameplay Walkthrough (Steam Indie Puzzle Platformer Game 2016) (No Commentary)
snippet.description:
Clockwork Gameplay - Walkthrough Playthrough (Steam Indie Adventure Platformer Game 2016) (No Commentary Let's Play)

Clockwork is a time-bending puzzle-platformer that tells the story of Atto, a lonely mechanical boy in the great city of Watchtower. Explore the city, discover its mysterious past, control time and fight terrifying boss battles. Clockwork features over 60+ hand-drawn, steampunk-inspired levels.

Source - http://store.steampowered.com/app/509210/

Gaming system:
Video card - Asus nvidia GeForce GTX 760 DC2OC 2GB GDDR5
CPU - Intel Core i5 4670 - 3.4 GHz (3.8 GHz boost)
RAM - 8GB DDR3

Operating system: Windows 7 Utimate 64 bit

Video is recorded with nvidia Shadowplay software.
